00044 namespace boost {
00045 namespace mpl {
00046 
00047 // watch out for GNU gettext users, who #define _(x)
00048 #if !defined(_) || defined(BOOST_MPL_NO_UNNAMED_PLACEHOLDER_SUPPORT)
00049 typedef arg<-1> _;
00050 
00051 namespace placeholders {
00052 using boost::mpl::_;
00053 }
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 //: agurt, 17/mar/02: one more placeholder for the last 'apply#' 
00057 //: specialization
00058 #define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 \
00059     (3,(1, BOOST_MPL_METAFUNCTION_MAX_ARITY + 1, "boost/mpl/placeholders.hpp"))
00060 #include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00061 
00062 } // namespace mpl
00063 } // namespace boost

00069 
00070 #else
00071 #define i BOOST_PP_FRAME_ITERATION(1)
00072 
00073 typedef arg<i> BOOST_PP_CAT(_,i);
00074 
00075 namespace placeholders {
00076 using boost::mpl::BOOST_PP_CAT(_,i);
